message.raw:
Now works with 337ns delay for hardware triggering. There's still a sorta race
condition where triggering is enabled even when the thing is in software start,
so I have to disable it there.

so I have to disable it there.

message:
Now works with 337ns delay for hardware triggering. There's still a sorta race
condition where triggering is enabled even when the thing is in software start,
